# Instalación.

1. Instalar el JDK:
   1. Descargar "**OpenJDK 15 (LTS)**" desde [AdoptOpenJDK](https://adoptopenjdk.net/releases.html?variant=openjdk15#x64_win) ( seleccionar **"Instalar JDK"**).
   -  Ejecuta el instalador, usando los valores por default.

   ![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDXNZRCE2VXMZBH2GWQNW74YO44W%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=1920&height=807&action=Access "JDK Open")

2. Instalar Gradle:
   - Descarga "**Binary only distribution**" desde [pagina de descarga de Gradle ](https://gradle.org/gradle-download/).
   - Descomprime el archivo.  Se recomienda descomprimirlo en una ubicación parecida a la siguiente `C:\Users\ROGJ\Tools`.

   - En propiedades del sistema, seleccionar **Variables de entorno...**
  
![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDVB6OEDVGX7NVEKFZLE74AG47BB%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..U0dwWkxqSS9VSVpJV05OZzB2Q2E3bDRQckRzY1BtOVJHeVNQclBab2R2OD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=550&height=650&action=Access "Propiedades del sistema")

 - Agrega una nueva variable del sistema  de entorno llamada `GRADLE_HOME` y establece la ruta que creamos anteriormente (ejemplo `C:\Users\ROGJ\Tools\gradle-x.y`).

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDVZG5OCUVHAWZDIOU6ZYHDM4A4Z%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..U0dwWkxqSS9VSVpJV05OZzB2Q2E3bDRQckRzY1BtOVJHeVNQclBab2R2OD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=649&height=592&action=Access "Nueva variable de entorno")

   - Actualiza el sistema `Path` para que incluya el directorio `bin` desde el inicio de Gradle (ejemplo `Path`=`...;%GRADLE_HOME%\bin`).

 ![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDWTBHHTTPDEFFEJKY5BDRAQHS4W%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..U0dwWkxqSS9VSVpJV05OZzB2Q2E3bDRQckRzY1BtOVJHeVNQclBab2R2OD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=677&height=650&action=Preview "Variables de entorno")

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDUCHYAK4KUKQZHYUP4DODB2X4ZQ%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..U0dwWkxqSS9VSVpJV05OZzB2Q2E3bDRQckRzY1BtOVJHeVNQclBab2R2OD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=655&height=599&action=Preview "Editar variable entorno")
      
Se verifica la instalación con el comando ```gradle -v```.

```sh
command gradle -v 
```

----


# Instalación de Android Studio

1. Descargar el instalador a través del enlace de descarga en su web [oficial](https://developer.android.com/studio#downloads).


![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDWQTY6CFDRDH5GZHFLZFNNYN4BB%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=1076&height=374&action=Access "Android Download")

2. Iniciar la instalación.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDQRGNVHNVXRKFG27W2HTVRNB6C6%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=809&height=636&action=Preview "install-android-step1")

3. Posteriormente se mostrará la configuración sobre la memoria RAM máxima que se dedicara al emulador de Android.
Esta parte se puede cambiar mas adelante y lo recomendable es dejarlo como se muestra en la pantalla, seleccionar de nuevo en **Next**.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDXK3G4O6OMXFFCZNMNWZLFHCMO3%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=809&height=636&action=Access "install-android-step2")

4. Una vez terminado el proceso de instalación, seleccionar **Finish** para que se abra Android Studio por primera vez.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDS3MLOLASFVVVCJAIWYHP7XRCWP%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=809&height=636&action=Access "install-android-step3")


5. Al abrir Android Studio por primera vez se muestra una pantalla como la siguiente. En ella se preguntará si se desea importar la configuración de una versión anterior. Android Studio detectará la configuración por sí mismo, y si no existe una configuración anterior guardada, seleccionar la opción "Do not import settings".

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDQ22M64SQ3X5NB2J6C672UTDIAP%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=593&height=269&action=Preview "install-android-step4")

6. A continuación se solicitará permiso para enviar datos de uso y estadísticas a Google, con el objetivo de que sean usados para mejorar la aplicación. Es totalmente opcional.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDSH67DRKGE3BNFKSU7JS7S2SO6F%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=918&height=409&action=Access
"install-android-step5")

7. Se mostrará si se desea hacer una instalación estándar o personalizada de Android Studio. Seleccionar la opción "Standard" y continuar con "Next".

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDRF2UAPS52NV5EYA6GFD3AC432V%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=759&height=574&action=Access "install-android-step6")

8. A continuación se solicita la selección de un tema para el editor de código, siempre se podrá cambiar más tarde desde las opciones, así como personalizar todos los colores y fuentes si es necesario.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDVCIMKZ4L54CBFL6ZWDYDWXKGBF%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=769&height=576&action=Access "install-android-step7")

9. Android Studio mostrará los componentes que necesita descargar.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDRC4EHAEES5GZEI7FNSBTG4PGOK%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=616&height=469&action=Access "install-android-step8")

# Configurar un AVD



1. Abrir Android Studio.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDQL47QY2GOEXVH2MHLH22UURQBN%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=960&height=606&action=Access "Open android")


2. Abrir opción **Configure** y seleccionar AVD Manager.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDSH7DR6IP4LIRB33DWNA7SGXPMV%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=990&height=807&action=Access "Select AVD Manager")


3. Se mostrará una ventana como la siguiente, seleccionar botón de **Create Virtual Device**.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDUPXIJHKN722NGI6ADMIXYNQQIK%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=960&height=606&action=Access "Create Virtual Device")


4. Se mostrará una nueva ventana con una lista de dispositivos, seleccionar categoría *Phone*, dispositivo *Pixel 2 XL* y continuar con **Next**.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDREICK36TKL3BBINJY3SVAIKLNK%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=1243&height=807&action=Access "Pixel 2 Select")


5. Seleccionar la última versión de android la cual tiene el nombre *R* y continuar con **Next**

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDW3ZSRCFEQBVFBJOZJW4QNI6LRZ%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=1243&height=807&action=Access "Android version")


6. Por ultimo se mostrará la pantalla de confirmación, se asignará un nombre al AVD para después finalizar con **Finish**.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDSZHIGXZYN62JC2FQOWLFS2YZ7L%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=1243&height=807&action=Access "Confirm AVD")


## Ejecutar AVD Manager

1. En la pantalla de selección de AVD seleccionar en el icono de la flecha verde para iniciar nuestro dispositivo virtual.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDWI6KAPST7DUZGKWCR7AJT2JDZ7%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..Tzh6OFpPdUoraUJBKzR6b3V0YXU2V3pTbUxJL2dBREZMT2JySWxsZHNqMD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=960&height=606&action=Access
"Run AVD")

2. Se abrira una nueva ventana donde se ejecutara el emulador del AVD.

![alt text](https://northeurope1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fgft365.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!PomWhnd-ykC8-uvFg50vF-OIQuyLAapFsa6r18v_c0y9xDXeUhP1SpS-XzPsMHcV%2Fitems%2F01SMDXNDW4EQ2BOGS2RBCLTFA2GEEYWSBX%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..U0dwWkxqSS9VSVpJV05OZzB2Q2E3bDRQckRzY1BtOVJHeVNQclBab2R2OD0&encodeFailures=1&srcWidth=&srcHeight=&width=1920&height=807&action=Access
"Example")
